metadata.title: CVE-2024-39493 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: qat - Fix ADF_DEV_RESET_SYNC memory leakUsing completion_done to determine whether the caller has goneaway only works after a complete call.  Furthermore it's stillpossible that the caller has not yet called wait_for_completion,resulting in another potential UAF.Fix this by making the caller use cancel_work_sync and then freeingthe memory safely.
